give way to the Plaza Theatre.

721405f-a.text:
Madison Avenue, east side, north from 58th Street, showing Plaza Theatre (old Lenox Lyceum). Block will be demolished the
following year.
May 3, 1928.
P.L. Sperr, Photographer.

721407f-a.text:
(1)
Madison Avenue, west side, from 58th to 61st Streets. On the N.W. corner of 59th Street is the old Hoffman Arms, which will be demolished about 1933. It is supposed to be a little
over fifty years old.
June 14, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, a closer view of the Hoffman Arme, taken the previous
fall.
October 21, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
